summary: Professional HR coordination and management professional offering a strong background in employee training and development, new hire orientations and employee relations. A committed HR professional with around 3.5 years of qualitative experience in HRD/Administration including Recruitment & Selection, Performance Management System, MIS & HRIS, Employee Master, Training & Development and HR ISO documentation. Proficient in MS Word, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint.

experience.title: HR Assistant
experience.description: Recruitment: Sourcing and shortlisting resumes, coordinating interviews; Preliminary screening of candidates; Preparing and issuing offer letters; On-boarding and joining formalities; Salary break up. Performance Management System: assisted in design and development of appraisal forms and competency framework; conducted PMS awareness workshops; guided employees to fill appraisal forms; assisted in designing KRAs. MIS/HRIS/Employee Master: consolidated additions, separations, transfers; generated reports; managed attrition details. Training & Development: identified needs, planned training programs, budget, calendar, arranged trainers. Leave & Attendance: maintained attendance, processed paysheets and payroll; updated leave balances. HRIS: tested and uploaded live data; ISO documentation: maintained files and dashboard; exit interviews and formalities; drafted department announcements.

experience.title: Management Trainee, QA
experience.description: Monitored quality processes according to ISO 9001:2000 standards; tracked fortnightly reports and quality objectives; QMS induction for new joinees; arranged project kick-off meetings; ensured statutory compliance of documents; received training on Software Development Life Cycle.

experience.title: HR Coordinator
experience.description: Screened profiles from job portals and short-listed candidates; coordinated with recruitment head for walk-ins; conducted telephonic interviews and scheduling; prepared offer and appointment letters; completed joining formalities and shared training schedules; induction to HR policies; maintained hard and soft copies of employee records; addressed staff concerns; managed HR administrative tasks including personal files, contracts, confirmations and exit letters; managed exit formalities and conducted exit interviews.
